plays.text: Penalty to Ray Ferraro 2 minutes for Slashing Marek Malik

Penalty to Yannick Tremblay 2 minutes for High Sticking Shane Willis
Penalty to Yannick Tremblay 2 minutes for High Sticking Shane Willis
Penalty to Todd Reirden 2 minutes for Slashing ROD BRIND'AMOUR
Penalty to Kamil Piros 2 minutes for Tripping Erik Cole
Penalty to ROD BRIND'AMOUR 2 minutes for Roughing LUBOS BARTECKO
